summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4895 for the improvement of 48th Avenue Southwest and same produced, from West Edmunds Street to West Dakota Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 56110, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
